source_question: 这件事揭示哪些隐喻，对未来有什么影响？

localizations.name: 情感-当前状态
localizations.description: 分析当前事件对个人情感和心理状态的影响，揭示其中的隐喻。
localizations.summary: 了解事件对情感层面的影响，识别心理隐喻。

localizations.name: Analogy-symbolic interpretation
localizations.description: Uncover the hidden meanings and symbols within the cards to reveal deeper insights.
localizations.summary: Exploring the symbolic language of the Tarot cards can provide profound insights into the user's question.

localizations.name: 运势-未来趋势
localizations.description: 从事件中分析未来可能的发展趋势，预测其对个人运势的影响。
localizations.summary: 预测事件对未来运势的可能影响。

localizations.name: Analogy-metaphorical connections
localizations.description: Analyze the metaphors present in the cards to understand their relevance to the user's query.
localizations.summary: Interpreting the metaphors in the Tarot spread can offer a unique perspective on the user's question.

localizations.name: 决策-行动建议
localizations.description: 基于前两个维度的分析，提出应对当前事件和未来趋势的具体行动建议。
localizations.summary: 提供基于分析的应对策略，指导行动方向。

localizations.name: Analogy-subconscious insights
localizations.description: Delve into the subconscious messages conveyed by the cards to uncover hidden truths and revelations.
localizations.summary: Exploring the subconscious insights of the Tarot cards can provide profound revelations about the user's query.

locales.question: 这件事揭示哪些隐喻，对未来有什么影响？
locales.overall_summary: 通过分析情感、运势和决策三个维度，全面解读事件隐喻，预测未来影响，并给出行动建议。

locales.question: What metaphors does this reveal and what impact will it have on the future?
locales.overall_summary: By analyzing the symbolic interpretation, metaphorical connections, and subconscious insights of the Tarot cards, a deeper understanding of the user's question and its impact on the future can be revealed through the lens of analogy.
